asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

disabled.description: Whether the focus trap is disabled

fallbackFocus.description: Element to focus if initialFocus is not found. By default, focuses on container element

initialFocus.description: Element to focus when trap is activated. By default, focuses on first tabbable element

returnFocusOnDeactivate.description: Whether to return focus to the element that had focus when trap was activated

setReturnFocus.description: Custom element to return focus to when trap is deactivated
